title: Huge, Historic Home in Prime Northern Liberties Location!
description:
Situated in the heart of the desirable Northern Liberties neighborhood, this very large 4 to 6 bedroom, 2.5 bath four-story home is full of historic charm! The kitchen features a gas range, range hood, dishwasher, refrigerator and white cabinetry. Also enjoy hardwood floors, built-in shelving, decorative mantels, a private back patio, basement area for storage, and your own washer and dryer. On the second and third floors, you will find spacious bedrooms and two additional flex rooms, giving you 6 rooms total that can serve a multitude of uses! You also will love being within walking distance to popular restaurants along N 3rd and 2nd Sts, like Abbaye, Honey’s Sit ‘N Eat, Cafe La Maude, Bourbon & Branch, Standard Tap and more! Plus, you are in close proximity to I-95 for traveling in and out of the city with ease.
*Sorry, no pets
*Tenants responsible for electric, gas, water, internet and snow removal.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.

title: ▶▶Modern Row Home Fishtown, Philly◀◀
description:
Modern spacious 4 bedroom 3 bath row home located steps away from local bars, restaurants, and the subway. This beautiful home features High Ceilings, Hardwood Floors, Granite Counter Tops, Stainless Steel Appliances in an Open Concept multi-floor layout offering tons of Natural Light. A highlight of the home is the private rooftop featuring a Built-In Outdoor Kitchen with Stainless Steel Cabinets, Grill, Refrigerator, Ice Maker, Kegerator, and a Bar Top Seating Area. Enjoy panoramic views of Philadelphia that can be enjoyed while sitting underneath a custom Pergola / Wooden Deck Lounging Area. Below the rooftop is the 3rd floor Master Suite featuring a Custom Walk-in Closet, and a Massive Bathroom Including a Jacuzzi Tub and Large Glass Shower. On the second floor, there are two spacious bedrooms, a full bath, and stackable Samsung washer/dryer. The first floor features a welcoming living room with surround sound speakers, a modern kitchen with granite counter tops, a spacious dining area with a Built-in Bar Top Seating Area. Right off the kitchen is a Private Backyard and Vegetable Garden. Last but not least, the Large Finished Basement features a 3rd full bathroom and spacious bedroom. The home's location is excellent as you are only a 10 minute subway ride into center city, and a 15 minute walk into the heart of Fishtown. The home is right across the street from Franny Lou's, Urban Axes, Martha's, Monkey Club, Pizza Brain, and Philly Brewing Co. Come check out this awesome rental as it wont last long! Feel free to call, text, or email me for more information. Thanks!
Tenants pay all utilities. Pets allowed, case-by-case, pet deposit/rent. No smoking.

Security Deposit 2X rent: $5,500
First Month's Rent: $2,750
Last Month's Rent: $2,750
1.5-year lease preferred, Indoor and Outdoor furniture can be included for an additional charge upon request.

title: Furnished one bedroom condo for rent
description: This beautifully furnished, 1000 sq. ft., one bedroom bi-level condo is located at Pier 3 on the Delaware River waterfront. Easy access to I-95 and Ben Franklin Bridge.

title: Spacious 1BR Apartment in Manayunk
description:
Beautiful 3-story apartment close to downtown Manayunk! You won’t find a better combination of affordability & proximity to local attractions.
Located on Seville Street, a quiet, permitted street that always has spots available. This front-facing unit usually gets great natural light.
Stepping through the front door, you’ll find a modern-looking kitchen with fresh appliances, plenty of cabinet space, and natural hardwood floors. Very easy to fit a 4- or 6-person dining set. In addition, a compact washer/dryer stack makes laundry extremely convenient. I even make use of the space under the stairs to store some of my extra junk!
Above the spiral stairs, you’ll find a spacious living room perfect for hosting others or just sprawling. The north wall’s small bevel is perfect for a bookcase, and the 0.5 BA is perfect for easy access.
On the top floor, you’ll find a spacious bedroom & bathroom. The bedroom has plenty of space for a bed & select furniture, and the bathroom is fitted with a large shower for your comfort. A California closet provides ample space for clothes & storage.
The place is heated & cooled via Gree wall units (lines were not completely installed, used some ivy decorations to hide it on 2nd/3rd floors).
Searching for someone to take the remainder of this lease (through May), as I will be moving out of the area for work. Furniture not included. If interested, please contact me via email & we can discuss further!

Description: SEE WHAT YOU'VE BEEN MISSING  Discover an upscale lifestyle at Silk Factory Apartments. Our landmark historic building features a brick exterior, soaring ceilings, large windows, and a beautiful courtyard with outdoor lounge seating and firepits, a picnic and grilling area with gas grills, and a community herb garden. description:
